answers.answer: Do not know about diabetes being cured........but my eyesight never got better after my gallbladder surgery.  Still nearsighted.I would think that if having your gallbladder out cured diabetes, there would be a run on gallbladder removal surgery.
Don't run and have your gallbladder removed!  I know several people with diabetes and no gallbladder, many, in fact developed the diabetes AFTER gallbladder removal.

question: I have heard that after a gallbladder removal a person's eyesight is better and diabetes is cured. Is this true?
title: New findings
